title: Print, "Ornamental Design from "Nouvelle suite de cahiers de flerurs naturelle a l'usage des dessinateurs et des peintres", No.1, Inventes et dessines par Jean Pillement. Graves par Anne Allen.", after 1775
medium: Etching with colored inks à la poupé on cream laid paper tipped in cream paper
markings: Verso: stamp in brown ink: Cooper Union Museum New York [Lugt 457e]
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Floral motif. Upper level: small red flowers with green leaves; lower level: blue berries with yellow, green, and brown feather-like leaves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Ornamental Design from "Nouvelle suite de cahiers de flerurs naturelle a l'usage des dessinateurs et des peintres", No.1, Inventes et dessines par Jean Pillement. Graves par Anne Allen.", after 1775.
after 1775. Etching with colored inks à la poupé on cream laid paper tipped in cream paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-41-35.
